title: Lag on Main servers, No lag on PBE though
body:
Hey, just recently been getting a lot of lag on the Main servers. Normally I average 63ms and it's very consistent, but now my ping spikes between 70-100ms almost every second. 1 Second 63ms, next second 100ms, next 80ms. 

On the PBE though, I was constantly  getting 51ms. Never spiked.

I've tried majority of the troubleshooting solutions on the support page.

If anyone has an idea of what could be the problem, please let me know!

replies.body: Are you getting any lag spikes despite the increased ping?  Your connection might be unstable, so I recommend running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just to make sure your local settings are in good health.  Then test it in a custom and let me know how it goes.

UPDATE: i seemed to have fix the problem, 

i manually updated a driver very poorly, so i uninstalled everything and reinstalled driver correctly

seems to have fix

Update: I found out that I was having Packet loss During games. This happens right when I spawn in.

Heres a printscreen of Network Diagnostic from your website http://prntscr.com/gepvrx

It says I had high packet loss, and this graph looks about right because around the 20min mark of the game, I was getting 63ms consistent for a bit, just as the graph suggests.

Any ideas on what could be causing this packet loss, it's been happening since yesterday (28 august)

I went through what I could
-Firewall
-ConfigureDNS
-Packetloss
-DNSflush


Just now I tried going into a custom, when I spawned in my ping was normal for a bit, around 2mins later, it started spiking again. 

Every second is a random number between 90-140ms

And to answer your question, I dont lag spike as in freeze, its just very choppy and hard to control my champion.
